page.title: 20Surburbs,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: The area of Orpington stretching to Green Street Green and Chelsfield is largely residential,although one third of the land is used for arable farming. One major road,two main roads,and smaller tree-lined roads cross this area.Commuters to London have a good train service. Most of the people live in well-built, brick houses put up before 1939,or modern homes erected in the last decade. The area is well served by schools and churches.There are three local shopping centres but most people do their main shopping in Orpington or Bromley. Orpington Hospital provides care for a large population.The original huts from 1915 are now used for administration. The second world war huts are used as wards.The new block,18 months old,has the most modern equipment and computer.
